title: Checking on my Investment in Person - Framework Laptop Factory Tour
description: Get your 12VHPWR CableMod adapters at: Amazon USA: Global Store: Caseking:  While in Taiwan for Computex, linus decided it was the perfect time to check in on his investment in Framework in person. Its factory tour time, baby!
